this_title: Iconic: The Life And Work Of Terry O’Neill
introduction: British photographer Terry O’Neill is to be the subject of a feature-length documentary, titled Iconic: The Life And Work Of Terry O’Neill, helmed by UK filmmaker Oliver Murray.The film is being made with the close co-operation of Terry O’Neill’s surviving family. O’Neill will narrate his own story via previously unheard recordings.
chinese_title: Iconic: The Life And Work Of Terry O’Neill
